thread.title: Hey Google, Google Assistant cambia parola d’ordine
thread.title_full: Hey Google, Google Assistant cambia parola d’ordine

posts.author: amminisrtrazione
posts.title: Hey Google, Google Assistant cambia parola d’ordine
posts.text:
INFORMAZIONI Hey Google, Google Assistant cambia parola d’ordine 
OK Google diventa Hey Google. L’Assistente Google cambia parola d’ordine con Big G che decide di usare un richiamo più colloquiale modificando il comando che lo richiama nato originariamente con Google Now, prima versione dell’assistente intelligente della grande G e integrato nell’ormai storico Moto X presentato nel 2013. 
Google Now può essere considerata una versione più “ingessata” e meno flessibile dell’assistente Google, ma con l’arrivo del più moderno Google Assistant l’interazione con l’intelligenza artificiale era diventata più naturale e colloquiale. La decisione di cambiare la frase di attivazione è dunque figlia di tale evoluzione: “Hey Google” (oltre ad essere molto simile all’attivatore “Hey Siri” di Apple) appare più naturale e colloquiale rispetto a “Ok Google”. Condividi:

posts.title: Google punta sulle startup italiane con Talent Garden Firmata oggi a Milano la partnership. L’obiettivo è di fornire alle giovani imprese gli strumenti per crescere. Anche grazie ai programmi di network internazionale
posts.text:
INFORMAZIONI Google punta sulle startup italiane con Talent Garden Firmata oggi a Milano la partnership. L’obiettivo è di fornire alle giovani imprese gli strumenti per crescere. Anche grazie ai programmi di network internazionale 
Da oggi il mondo italiano dell’imprenditoria innovativa avrà un alleato importante al proprio fianco. Google ha, infatti, deciso di investire nell’ecosistema di startup del nostro Paese. Per farlo ha scelto Talent Garden, la piattaforma per i talenti del digitale. L’annuncio è stato fatto a Milano, terreno fertile in questi anni per giovani start-up e imprese digitali. 

Siamo abituati a pensare che le grandi idee nascano in Silicon Valley mentre molte realtà come Spotify, per fare qualche nome, o Skype, sono state create in realtà lontane dalla fertile California, rispettivamente in Svezia e in Estonia. 

Ora Google prova a creare una rete a supporto delle idee più brillanti. Con l’accordo appena annunciato, Talent Garden che ha 16 sue sedi distribuite in tutta Italia, entra a far parte del network internazionale di Google for Entrepreneurs, la divisione di Google dedicata a formare e connettere gli imprenditori innovativi e le startup di tutto il mondo. 

L’obiettivo della partnership è quello di abilitare un processo virtuoso di internazionalizzazione attraverso i programmi del network internazionale Google for Entrepreneurs. Oltre ad accedere ai programmi di scambio, formazione e condivisione, come Blackbox Connect – un bootcamp in Silicon Valley con sessioni di mentorship e incontri con gli investitori – i membri di Talent Garden Milano Calabiana riceveranno uno speciale Passaporto di Google for Entrepreneurs, che permetterà loro di lavorare e incontrare altre startup nelle decine di organizzazioni partner nel mondo. 

«Siamo orgogliosi di poter offrire anche in Italia le opportunità di crescita di Google for Entrepreneurs – ha dichiarato David Grunwald, Senior Manager di Google for Entrepreneurs in Europa, Medio Oriente e Africa -. Milano vanta una forte comunità di startup ed è con grande piacere che accogliamo Talent Garden e il mondo dell’imprenditoria innovativa italiana nel nostro network internazionale». 

«Vogliamo dare ai migliori professionisti del digitale e della tecnologia la possibilità di crescere e connettersi con un network internazionale – ha dichiarato Davide Dattoli, Ceo di Talent Garden -. La partnership con Google for Entrepreneurs sigla una unione di intenti per dare alle startup italiane opportunità di crescita, di mentorship e di accesso a una rete di eventi globale». 
«Questa partnership dimostra l’impegno di Google per la creazione di un ecosistema digitale virtuoso nel nostro paese – aggiunge Fabio Vaccarono, Managing Director di Google Italy -. Il nuovo progetto, infatti, si inserisce coerentemente tra gli investimenti a lungo termine che negli anni Google ha messo in atto in Italia, con l’obiettivo di offrire a tutti, cittadini e imprese, solidi strumenti e formazione specifica per cogliere le opportunità del digitale». Condividi:

posts.title: Cấp chứng chỉ an toàn khu định hóa theo Nghị định số 44/2016/NĐ-CP tại Điện Biên
posts.text:
VIỆN QUẢN LÝ ĐÀO TẠO ESC VIỆT NAM 
                                                                        THÔNG BÁO 
                  ( V/v: Mở các lớp huấn luyện  An toàn lao động, vệ sinh cần lao ) 
– cứ theo Luật an toàn lao động ngày 25/06/2016 
– Căn cứ theo Nghị định số 37/2016/NĐ-CP quy định chi tiết thi hành một số điều của Luật An toàn, vệ sinh cần lao về bảo hiểm tai nạn cần lao, bệnh nghề bắt buộc. 
– cứ theo Nghị định số 39/2016/NĐ-CP quy định chi tiết thi hành một số điều của Luật An toàn, vệ sinh lao động có hiệu lực từ 1/7/2016 
– cứ theo Nghị định số 44/2016/NĐ-CP quy định chi tiết một số điều của Luật an toàn, vệ sinh lao động về hoạt động kiểm định kỹ thuật an toàn cần lao, huấn luyện an toàn, vệ sinh lao động và quan trắc môi trường lao động 
I. Đối tượng dự khóa học an toàn cần lao: 
–  Nhóm 1:  Người quản lý đảm nhận công tác an toàn, vệ sinh cần lao 
–  Nhóm 2:  Người làm thuê tác an toàn, vệ sinh cần lao 
–  Nhóm 3:  Người cần lao làm mướn việc có yêu cầu nghiêm nhặt về an toàn, vệ sinh cần lao là người làm công việc thuộc danh mục công việc có đề nghị nghiêm nhặt về an toàn, vệ sinh lao động do Bộ lao động – Thương binh và tầng lớp ban hành. 
–  Nhóm 4:  Người lao động không thuộc các nhóm theo quy định tại các khoản 1, 2, 3, 5 Điều này, bao gồm cả người học nghề, tập nghề, thử việc để làm việc cho người dùng lao động. 
–  Nhóm 5:  Người làm công tác y tế 
–  Nhóm 6:  An toàn, vệ sinh viên theo quy định tại điều luật 74 Luật an toàn, vệ sinh lao động. 
II. Nội dung khóa học huấn luyện an toàn cần lao, vệ sinh lao động:  dựa trên điều 18, điều 19 và điều 20 Nghị định số 44/2016/NĐ-CP. 
thời gian huấn luyện an toàn lao động theo quy định cho nhóm 1 và 4 tối thiểu 16 giờ; nhóm 2 tối thiểu 48 giờ. Với nhóm 3, thời gian huấn luyện tối thiểu là 24 giờ. Đặc biệt, nghị định số 44 có quy định thời kì huấn luyện tối thiểu với nhóm 5 và 6 lần lượt là 56 giờ và 4 giờ. 
III. Chứng chỉ, chứng nhận: 
Học viên tham gia khóa học phê chuẩn sát hạch, kiểm tra sẽ được cấp: 
– chứng thực an toàn cần lao với nhóm 1, 2, 5, 6 (hạn 2 năm); 
– Thẻ an toàn với nhóm 3 (hạn vận 2 năm); 
– Chứng chỉ chứng thực chuyên môn về y tế lao động (hạn 5 năm); 
– Sổ theo dõi người thuộc nhóm 4 được huấn luyện. 
Để công tác tổ chức khóa học được chu đáo, kính đề nghị Các đơn vị, doanh nghiệp, cá nhân 
có nhu cầu vui lòng đăng ký trực tiếp bằng Điện thoại, Email, Fax hoặc Công văn về Viện.

posts.author: 草书 草书 当前离线
posts.title: 改革开放前，你家“夜不闭户”吗？-
posts.text:
改革开放前，你家“夜不闭户”吗？其实，那时的老百姓大多“夜不闭户”，这是我小时候的亲眼所见。每到炎炎夏夜，左邻右舍大多门窗洞开，然后在自家门框上横拉一根铅丝，再挂块花布帘子遮羞，还家家点一盘蚊香。蚊香的幽光、窗外的幽暗、虫儿的悠鸣、花露水的幽香、蒲扇轻摇的悠风，构成了我们儿时夏夜里的记忆
改革开放前，老百姓常常“夜不闭户”，是因为社会治安好吗？不是的，打架、斗殴、抢夺、扒窃时有耳闻。那为啥还“夜不闭户”？住房条件恶劣透顶。农村近三十年没有新建房，几亿农民都是解放前留下的破房子。城里呢？往往一家三代蜗居狭小陋室，空调？电扇？一概没有，到了炎炎夏夜，走投无路了，唯有门窗洞开、
简单讲，改革开放前的“夜不闭户”只发生在炎炎夏夜，背后掩藏的是千千万万黎民百姓的悲苦往事。
感谢改革开放，物质极大丰富了起来，苦不堪言的“夜不闭户”一去不复返了

thread.title: Javier González se va de Chipre con un bronce
thread.title_full: Javier González se va de Chipre con un bronce

posts.author: Faro de Vigo
posts.title: Javier González se va de Chipre con un bronce
posts.text:
taekwondo - Campeonato de Europa Junior Javier González se va de Chipre con un bronce El pontevedrés se quedó cerca de pasar a la final - Ortiz también fue bronce redacción | pontevedra 07.11.2017 | 05:19 Javier González y Arlet Ortiz (ambos con medalla). // FdV 
El pontevedrés Javier González logró en el Campeonato de Europa Junior celebrado en Chipre un meritorio metal de bronce. El taekwondista lerezano del club Mace Sport estuvo a punto de pasar a la final en una hermosa semifinal contra el croata Marco Golubic. 
Javier González, que competía en -68 kilos, comenzó el Europeo contra Niyaz Zulfugarli y venció con absoluta superioridad (7-19). En segunda ronda esperaba el portugués Diogo Rafael Alves de la Costa, que se había librado de la primera eliminatoria. El pontevedrés fue mejor para dar el salto a los cuartos de final por un resultado de 7-10. 
Estaba Javier ante el combate decisivo, que era el que garantizaba una presea, y para conseguirla tenía que superar al serbio Dusan Bozanic. Y lo hizo sin dejar opción alguna a su contrincante y cerró el resultado en un claro 10-4, que confirmaba como mínimo la medalla. 
González quería más y buscó el pase a final contra lo croata Marco Golubic. Y fue un combate espectacular, competido, hermoso entre dos grandes contrincantes que se decidió por la mínima a favor del croata (11-12). 
Así, González también se llevó un bronce como el que la marinense Arlet Ortiz logró días atrás. Compartir en Twitter

thread.title: Ayodhya settlement draft to be ready by December 6, says UP Shia Central Waqf Board
thread.title_full: Ayodhya settlement draft to be ready by December 6, says UP Shia Central Waqf Board

posts.author: PTI
posts.title: Ayodhya settlement draft to be ready by December 6, says UP Shia Central Waqf Board
posts.text:
Rakesh Jhunjhunwala made Rs 900 crore in 1 day on 1 share; still wants more 
The Uttar Pradesh Shia Central Waqf Board today said it would prepare a draft proposal for a peaceful settlement of the Ayodhya dispute by December 6, the day the Babri Mosque was demolished in 1992. Board Chairman Wasim Rizvi, who has made public his opinion that a Ram temple should be built at the site, said he would visit Ayodhya this month to meet seers and mahants. “I have already discussed terms and conditions with many of them and some petitioners for the draft proposal for agreement to settle the dispute mutually,” Rizvi told PTI. “By December 6, I hope we will be able to prepare our draft proposal for a mutual agreement,” he said. Rizvi last month met Art of Living founder Sri Sri Ravi Shankar in Bangalore and apprised him of the Board’s stand on a Ram temple at the site. The Board does not want a mosque constructed at the site. Instead, it should be constructed elsewhere in a Muslim- populated area, he has said. In 2010, the Allahabad High Court ruled a three-way division of the disputed 2.77-acre area between the Sunni Waqf Board, Nirmohi Akhara and Lord Ram Lalla. Rizvi, however, was of the view that partition of the disputed land in Ayodhya would not be a “practical idea” and would not be “peaceful and long lasting”. 
He did not divulge the contents of the draft he was preparing but said he would convene a meeting of the Waqf Board to get consent of the members before moving ahead on it and making it public. The Shia Central Waqf Board has impleaded itself as a party in the Ayodhya case by submitting a 30-page affidavit to the Supreme Court on August 8 this year. It has staked claim to the Babri mosque, maintaining that it was a Shia mosque. Rizvi, who claims to be authorised by the Board to move ahead on the issue, said the number of mosques in Ayodhya was sufficient for the Muslims residing there and there was no need for a new mosque. 
He said that those demanding construction of a mosque at Lord Ram’s birthplace, or near it, only wanted to prolong the dispute. “The demolished mosque belonged to the Shia Waqf and the All India Muslim Personal Law Board (AIMPLB) has no right to decide on it. Only the Shia board has the right to decide,” Rizvi has said earlier. About his meeting with Sri Sri Ravi Shankar, he said he had conveyed his intentions to him, adding that the initiative for the out-of-court settlement would strengthen Hindu-Muslim brotherhood. In a bid to resolve Ayodhya issue, Ravi Shankar reportedly met Nirmohi Akhara leaders and Muslim law board members recently. 
Though the AIMPLB is not a party in the case, it wields considerable influence as the apex Islamic body on religious and personal matters. AIMPLB member and Convenor of Babri Masjid Action Committee (BMAC) Zafaryab Jilani has denied that any of its authorised representatives met the Art of Living founder for an out-of-court settlement. “The Ayodhya dispute cannot be settled through arbitration. We will never withdraw our claim to the land in Ayodhya where once the Babri mosque stood and was demolished on December 6, 1992,” Jilani has said. More Top News

thread.title_full: "Co najmniej trzy filmy powstają we współpracy z Amerykanami". Polski rząd zachęca Hollywood do kręcenia nad Wisłą

posts.title: "Co najmniej trzy filmy powstają we współpracy z Amerykanami". Polski rząd zachęca Hollywood do kręcenia nad Wisłą
posts.text:
07-11-2017 (09:36) "Co najmniej trzy filmy powstają we współpracy z Amerykanami". Polski rząd zachęca Hollywood do kręcenia nad Wisłą Wiceminister kultury i dziedzictwa narodowego Jarosław Sellin, w TVN24 wspomniał o współpracy polskich i amerykańskich filmowców, która ma zaowocować powstaniem prawdziwych "hollywoodzkich produkcji". Wcześniej mówiło się o dwóch filmach, do których chciano zaangażować Mela Gibsona i Clinta Eastwooda. Teraz wiceminister wspomina "o co najmniej trzech produkcjach". Głosuj Opinie Jarosław Sellin był gościem programu "Jeden na jeden" (WP.PL, Fot: Konrad Żelazowski) 
Wiceminister Sellin był gościem programu "Jeden na jeden" w TVN24. W trakcie wywiadu padło pytanie o zapowiedziane jakiś czas temu koprodukcje filmowe, mające powstać we współpracy polskich i hollywoodzkich filmowców. Polityk potwierdził te doniesienia, mówiąc: 
- Ja wiem o co najmniej trzech produkcjach filmowych, konkretnych tematach podejmowanych przez twórców filmowych we współpracy z Amerykanami. Można to w skrócie nazwać produkcją hollywoodzką i myślę, że takie koprodukcje będą . 
Sellin dodał, że powstaniu takich filmów "będzie sprzyjać ustawa o zachętach". - Ustawa, którą niedługo przeprowadzimy, doprowadzi do tego, że będzie się opłacało również wielkim hollywoodzkim firmom produkować w Polsce. 
Takie rządowe zachęty funkcjonują w sąsiędnich państwach i zdaniem wiceministra są dla wielu zagranicznych producentów kluczowe przy wyborze miejsca realizacji danego filmu. 
- Mamy wspaniałe plenery, wspaniałe góry, niziny, parki, pałace, zamki, ruiny, gdzie można kręcić fantastyczne filmy. Producenci często tę chęć sygnalizują, ale wskazują na to, że u nas nie ma zachęt, a są gdzie indziej, w Czechach, na Węgrzech, na Litwie, we wszystkich krajach sąsiednich. Wolą więc kręcić tam - mówił Sellin w wywiadzie dla PAP na początku roku. 
Przypomnijmy, że w sierpniu br. prezes Polskiej Fundacji Narodowej zapowiedział powstanie dwóch filmowych koprodukcji polsko-amerykańskich. Pierwszy film miał opowiadać o Amerykanach biorących udział w pierwszej wojnie światowej, zaś drugi o wydarzeniach z sierpnia 1944 r., do których w swoim warszawskim przemówieniu nawiązywał Donald Trump . 
Prezes PFN dał jasno do zrozumienia, że oba filmy są rozpatrywane w kategorii superprodukcji, a nie niskobudżetowych dokumentów, na co wskazują nazwiska potencjalnych reżyserów. Jurkiewicz potwierdził oficjalnie, że trwają rozmowy z Melem Gibsonem i Clintem Eastwoodem . 
#dziejesiewkulturze: Mel Gibson odbył rozmowę życia z Sylvestrem Stallone'em 0

posts.author: Berita Daily Staff
posts.title: People stranded on Bukit Bendera brought down in stages
posts.text:
The first group of 10 people — comprising six adults and four children — arrived in a Fire and Rescue Department helicopter at the state Federal Reserve Unit in Rifle Range at 2.40pm 
GEORGE TOWN: Rescue workers have begun evacuating the 36 people stranded on Penang Hill. 
The first group of 10 people — comprising six adults and four children — arrived in a Fire and Rescue Department helicopter at the state Federal Reserve Unit in Rifle Range at 2.40pm today. 
They are currently receiving medical attention. 
All those rescued will be transferred to the Penang Caring Society Complex in Jalan Utama. 
Policed confirmed that a total of 36 people were stranded at the top of the hill when floods hit Penang on Saturday. 
Earlier, Penang Hill Corporation general manager L L Cheok announced that the rescue team had reached the top of the hill at around 11.20am. 
“The team managed to clear space for the helicopter to land near the Governor’s Bungalow at the top of Penang Hill. This was done after we received clearance. 
“Water supply has been restored partially at the top and food supply is sufficient,” he told the press at the Penang Hill lower station, The Star reported. 
He said that the rescue team comprised more than 60 personnel from Penang Hill Corporation, the Civil Defence Force (APM), Fire and Rescue Department, Royal Malay Regiment, St. John’s Ambulance, Air Putih constituency service centre and volunteers.

thread.title: UK minister Priti Patel apologises for meetings on Israel holiday
thread.title_full: UK minister Priti Patel apologises for meetings on Israel holiday

posts.author: PTI
posts.title: UK minister Priti Patel apologises for meetings on Israel holiday
posts.text:
Britain’s senior-most Indian-origin minister Priti Patel has issued a formal apology for holding undisclosed meetings, including with Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu, while holidaying in the Jewish country. The secretary of state for international development admitted meeting Netanyahu among other senior figures without “following the usual procedures” but claimed it was simply the result of “enthusiasm” to engage. “This summer I travelled to Israel, on a family holiday paid for myself. While away I had the opportunity to meet a number of people and organisations. The Foreign and Commonwealth Office (FCO) was aware of my visit while it was underway,” she said in a statement. “In hindsight, I can see how my enthusiasm to engage in this way could be misread, and how meetings were set up and reported in a way which did not accord with the usual procedures. I am sorry for this and I apologise for it,” she noted. 
Ministers are required to tell the Foreign Office when they are conducting official business overseas, but a BBC report had claimed last week that British diplomats in Israel were not informed about these meetings. Downing Street had dismissed it as a “private holiday” with nothing to investigate, but Prime Minister Theresa May had a follow up meeting with the minister over the issue his morning. “The prime minister welcomes the secretary of state’s clarification about her trip to Israel and has accepted her apology for her handling of the matter. The prime minister met the secretary of state this morning to remind her of the obligations which exist under the ministerial code,” a Downing Street spokesperson said. 
Opposition parties had called for Patel to resign if it emerges that she breached the ministerial code of conduct. The BBC report had revealed that Patel had been accompanied by pro-Israeli Conservative party lobbyist Lord Polak during several meetings on the 13-day visit in August. Among her 12 meetings, now made public, included an interaction with Yair Lapid, the leader of one of Israel’s main political parties (Yesh Atid), and visits to charity organisations. The senior Conservative MP’s meeting with the Israeli PM including discussions on her “family background” and “her experience growing up in an area of the UK with a thriving Jewish community”. 
The two leaders also discussed “the Israeli domestic political scene” as well as his “forthcoming visit to the UK” which took place last week. Patel also discussed “prospects for closer collaboration between Israel and the UK on development and humanitarian issues”. “The FCO (Foreign Office) are clear that UK interests were not damaged or affected by the meetings on this visit,” the Department for International Development (DfID) said. More Top News

thread.title: Luisito: "El domingo lloré de rabia"
thread.title_full: Luisito: "El domingo lloré de rabia"

posts.author: Faro de Vigo
posts.title: Luisito: "El domingo lloré de rabia"
posts.text:
farodevigo.es » Deportes » Deportes Pontevedra Luisito: "El domingo lloré de rabia e impotencia" Luisito reconoció que es la "primera vez desde que soy entrenador y estoy aquí en la que me sentí fulminado" a.d. | pontevedra 07.11.2017 | 08:08 Luisito en el entrenamiento de ayer en Príncipe Felipe. // Rafa Vázquez 
Tras el temporal, llegó la normalidad. El día a día atropella al Pontevedra con el técnico Luisito en el ojo del huracán teniendo que volver a la rutina de los entrenamientos con la sesión de recuperación de todos los lunes. Ayer el plantel tuvo la visita en los vestuarios de la presidenta Lupe Murillo y de Roberto Feáns antes de la charla previa de su entrenador en la que se trataron de poner sobre la mesa los errores que llevaron al equipo a la derrota en Talavera. 
En una sesión de trabajo normal, con aparente tranquilidad por parte de los jugadores y un Luisito especialmente serio, los jugadores hicieron trabajo con y sin balón previo a la jornada de descanso de hoy. 
Por primera vez desde hace semanas, Luisito también accedió a hacer declaraciones en esta situación excepcional que se ha generado tras su dimisión interrumpida. El técnico recalcó que su decisión no fue fruto de un calentón y "no quería ser un estorbo". Pero "viendo que el consejo de administración, la presidenta, el director deportivo y los futbolistas me convencieron, hubiese demostrado ser un cobarde si ella me hubiese aceptado la dimisión". 
El entrenador del Pontevedra habló de "orgullo" por la manera en la que todo el mundo le ha respaldado y espera que este apoyo le de fuerzas a todo el mundo para reconducir la situación deportiva. El objetivo a partir de ahora para el teense es el de tratar de "volver a ser ese Pontevedra súper competitivo para que a nivel defensivo no nos pase lo que nos está pasando". 
Luisito no escondió lo que ha sufrido en los últimos días y aseguró que "es la primera vez desde que soy entrenador y desde que estoy aquí en la que me sentí fulminado. Yo sé lo que me dedico a entrenar y lo que estoy sufriendo y lo que no quiero es que sufra todo el mundo por culpa mía. Ayer (por el domingo) lloré de rabia y de impotencia porque me fastidia la situación y me acabé fundiendo. Sinceramente, viendo la primera parte yo no contaba con perder". 
El técnico de Teo no quiso entrar a valorar antes de tiempo los posibles cambios que puedan llegar a partir del mes de diciembre. "Aún falta mucho, ahora tenemos que tirar con lo que tenemos y aquí y, evidentemente, si las cosas siguen así el mercado de invierno está para eso". En cualquiera caso Luisito quiso manifestar que antes de todo eso, el cuerpo técnico tiene "una fe ciega en los jugadores porque ya demostraron que son buenos futbolistas". Compartir en Twitter

posts.title: Fiat Chrysler Automobiles N.V. (FCAU) Stock Rating Upgraded by BidaskClub
posts.text:
Tweet 
Fiat Chrysler Automobiles N.V. (NYSE:FCAU) was upgraded by research analysts at BidaskClub from a “buy” rating to a “strong-buy” rating in a report released on Tuesday. 
FCAU has been the topic of several other research reports. Zacks Investment Research downgraded shares of Fiat Chrysler Automobiles N.V. from a “hold” rating to a “sell” rating in a report on Wednesday, August 16th. Bank of America Corporation set a $19.00 price objective on shares of Fiat Chrysler Automobiles N.V. and gave the stock a “hold” rating in a report on Wednesday, October 25th. Jefferies Group LLC upped their price objective on shares of Fiat Chrysler Automobiles N.V. from $14.00 to $19.00 and gave the stock a “buy” rating in a report on Wednesday, August 23rd. Kepler Capital Markets upgraded shares of Fiat Chrysler Automobiles N.V. from a “hold” rating to a “buy” rating in a report on Friday, July 28th. Finally, Morgan Stanley restated an “overweight” rating and set a $14.00 price objective on shares of Fiat Chrysler Automobiles N.V. in a report on Monday, July 17th. One equities research analyst has rated the stock with a sell rating, five have assigned a hold rating, seven have issued a buy rating and two have assigned a strong buy rating to the stock. Fiat Chrysler Automobiles N.V. presently has an average rating of “Buy” and an average price target of $15.84. 
Fiat Chrysler Automobiles N.V. ( NYSE FCAU ) opened at $18.13 on Tuesday. The stock has a market cap of $27,901.88, a price-to-earnings ratio of 7.89, a P/E/G ratio of 0.34 and a beta of 1.68. Fiat Chrysler Automobiles N.V. has a 12 month low of $6.71 and a 12 month high of $18.33. The company has a debt-to-equity ratio of 0.59, a quick ratio of 0.48 and a current ratio of 0.77. 
Hedge funds and other institutional investors have recently bought and sold shares of the stock. Ingalls & Snyder LLC purchased a new stake in Fiat Chrysler Automobiles N.V. during the third quarter worth about $181,000. Ballentine Partners LLC purchased a new stake in Fiat Chrysler Automobiles N.V. during the second quarter worth about $117,000. FineMark National Bank & Trust purchased a new stake in Fiat Chrysler Automobiles N.V. during the third quarter worth about $188,000. Oppenheimer & Co. Inc. purchased a new stake in Fiat Chrysler Automobiles N.V. during the first quarter worth about $124,000. Finally, BKS Advisors LLC purchased a new stake in Fiat Chrysler Automobiles N.V. during the second quarter worth about $128,000. Institutional investors and hedge funds own 29.55% of the company’s stock. 
About Fiat Chrysler Automobiles N.V. 
Fiat Chrysler Automobiles N.V., together with its subsidiaries, designs, engineers, manufactures, distributes, and sells vehicles, components, and production systems. The company operates through six segments: NAFTA, LATAM, APAC, EMEA, Maserati, and Components. It provides passenger cars, light trucks, and light commercial vehicles under the Abarth, Alfa Romeo, Chrysler, Dodge, Fiat, Fiat Professional, Jeep, Lancia, and Ram brand names; and luxury vehicles under the Maserati brand, as well as related service parts and accessories, and service contracts under the Mopar brand. posts.author: ZYG3645
posts.title: 关于长江路与夹浦新村北门交汇设置人行斑马线的建议 - 公安局 -乐居昆山
posts.text:
尊敬的昆山市公安局、交通局相关管理部门领导：我是昆山夹浦新村居民，长江路与夹浦新村北门口设有单向红绿灯，路对面是樾城农贸市场（菜场），夹浦新村居民经常往返穿越马路的对面菜市场，由于设有单向红绿灯，一般行人乘红灯时向路对面穿越，可行至道路中间绿化带缓冲区后，跨越路对面时，车辆与行人混行易造成安全事故，故请求主管部分能否在此区域设置行人斑马线，便于行人出入安全，谢谢！
回帖推荐 昆山市公安局 查看楼层
您好，经交警部门现场勘查，因长江路为主干道，车流量较大，为了安全起见、压降事故的发生，暂不具备划设行人斑马线的条件。

thread.title: Entrevista a Santiago Auserón: Juan Perro: "Cuando las banderas se agitan sobre las cabezas, el pensamiento se esfuma de inmediato"
thread.title_full: Entrevista a Santiago Auserón: Juan Perro: "Cuando las banderas se agitan sobre las cabezas, el pensamiento se esfuma de inmediato" | Público

posts.author: Parker
posts.text: Quizá España no tenga arreglo, por mucho que nos hayamos empeñado algunos, tras la senda de nuestros abuelos. No por ello vamos a cejar en el empeño. En el fondo, prefiero luchar contra lo imposible que creerme en posesión de las llaves del Paraíso. Pero, ¿estás seguro(a,) amigo(a) Parker, de que tiene arreglo Catalunya por vía de autodeterminación forzada con una extraña alianza entre derecha e izquierda? ¿Tiene arreglo la corrupción catalana o va a ser más o menos como la del resto de España? ¿Tiene arreglo el vicio histórico de la burguesía catalana de agitar las masas y los sentimientos cuando le conviene, para luego asociarse con la derecha estatal cuando toca echar el freno? Por mi parte, si una mayoría clara de los catalanes decide la independencia sin trampas ni manipulaciones, si por esa vía va a ser más fácil alcanzar el bienestar social, la justicia y los avances de la cultura, si mis familiares y amigos de esa querida tierra van a ser con ello más felices, adelante. Pero permíteme dudar que eso sea cierto. No me creo los cuentos sin ambigüedades ni matices.

posts.author: Kurt
posts.text: Celebro que estés de acuerdo en celebrar un referendum, estoy de acuerdo en que el arreglo que tiene Cataluña no es menos difícil, pero creo que la derecha catalana es más tragable y combatible. Para mí la independencia es primero una emancipación y luego el punto de partida hacia una republica social. Si la consecuencia para el resto de España es que el partido franquista se hecha al monte y vuelve a subyugar a todos quizá esta revolución catalana sirva como palanca de cambio y sea el momento de culminar lo que no acabaron nuestros abuelos. Gracias por contestar a pesar del troleo inicial que te he hecho. Mis disculpas.

thread.title_full: Tennis - Tennis-Forum+ #8: Vor London

posts.author: redaktion@derStandard.at (derStandard.at Redaktion)
posts.title: Tennis - Tennis-Forum+ #8: Vor London
posts.text:
Forum+ User machen Ticker 
Willkommen im 8. Forum+ zur ATP Tour. Auch hier wirken Redaktion und User eng zusammen. Die User " The_Judge ", " dr. supergscheit "," Tim Uppi " und "Gasquet" versorgen die Tennis-Community weiterhin mit regelmäßigen Updates. 
"The_Judge" ist im zivilen Leben Richter und begeisterter Tennisspieler und -zuseher. Für "dr. supergscheit" war die mehr als fünfstündige Daviscup-Nervenschlacht Muster gegen Stich 1994 die Erweckung für die Tennisbegeisterung. Und "Tim Uppi" hat sich gegen eine Profikarriere und für ein Psychologie-Studium entschieden, verfolgt aber weiterhin die größten Spiele. "Gasquet" zählt ebenfalls zu den Muster-Fans und verdankt seinen Nickname dem gleichnamigen Tennisspieler, auf den er 2007 bei den Australian Open aufmerksam wurde. 
Ausgewählte Tennis-Partien wird die Redaktion weiterhin begleiten, dieses Forum+ ist dazu gedacht, allen Tennis-Enthusiasten einen Ort zu bieten, an dem auch weniger beachtete Begegnungen aus dem Tennissport diskutiert werden können. 
Interessierte User können sich unter ugc@derstandard.at melden und mithelfen, dieses Forum+ noch lebendiger zu machen.

thread.title_full: Peste : L'Arabie Saoudite recommande d'éviter Madagascar, les Seychelles, et Maurice

posts.author: BA
posts.title: Peste : L'Arabie Saoudite recommande d'éviter Madagascar, les Seychelles, et Maurice
posts.text: Peste : L'Arabie Saoudite recommande d'éviter Madagascar, les Seychelles, et Maurice Mardi 7 Novembre 2017 - 11:21 L'Arabie Saoudite a tweeté une mise en garde à ses concitoyens quant à l'épidémie de peste qui sévit actuellement dans l'Océan Indien. Ainsi le ministère de la Santé saoudien demande-t-il à ses compatriotes d’éviter les voyages à destination des Seychelles, de Madagascar et de Maurice, relate dans ses colonnes L'Express.mu. À ceux qui sont obligés de s'y rendre, le ministère recommande de prendre toutes les précautions nécessaires, comme l’utilisation d’insecticide contre les piqures, se tenir éloignés des animaux morts ou malades ou encore éviter les bains de foule et les personnes malades. L'Arabie Saoudite recommande enfin de consulter un médecin dès l’apparition des symptômes à l’exemple d’une montée de température ou une inflammation des ganglions lymphatiques. Dans un article du Daily Mail, La Réunion est aussi évoquée comme étant une zone à "haut risque" d'infection. BA

thread.title: Experiment : Cialis replacing Doxazosin
thread.title_full: Experiment : Cialis replacing Doxazosin | Prostate Problems | Patient

posts.author: patient.info
posts.title: Experiment : Cialis replacing Doxazosin
posts.text:
So many people on this forum suggested Cialis over other alpha blockers like Doxazosin (that I have been taking effectively for years) that I finally gave in and decided to give it a try. I replaced 4mg Doxazosin with 5mg Cialis for 3 weeks, and the results were not good. Sure, retro ejaculation was gone and erection was improved. However, all of BPH symptoms came back. Low flow, urgency, low void volume, high retention, even stomach cramp.
 Anyone else tried Cialis before with a result like this ? Can you tell from this that my problem is more of a bladder or prostate problem ?
Hank

thread.title: Entrevista a Santiago Auserón: Juan Perro: "Cuando las banderas se agitan sobre las cabezas, el pensamiento se esfuma de inmediato"
thread.title_full: Entrevista a Santiago Auserón: Juan Perro: "Cuando las banderas se agitan sobre las cabezas, el pensamiento se esfuma de inmediato" | Público

posts.author: Parker
posts.text:
Bien, no sé si usted es el mismo Santiago Auseron, pero creo que a usted le pasa algo parecido a Podemos, una revolución les está pasando delante de las narices y se andan con remilgos y matices hasta el infinito, todo esto le va muy bien al régimen, pensadores que enreden en un eterno bla, bla, bla a la cabezas más rebeldes, y usted forma parte de ellos. Defender el derecho a decidir sin ambigüedades ni peros, las consecuencias para los pueblos vecinos? Pues deberán decidir esos pueblos, si seguir votando al señorito o apuntarse a los movimientos donde se hable de soberanía, autodeterminación y resistencia, y ese es un camino liberador que cada pueblo debe recorrer por sí mismo, si al final nos encontramos, pues sería maravilloso poder compartir proyecto con pueblos que siempre deberían de haber sido hermanos. Aquí en Catalunya somos muchos que hemos llegado a la conclusión de que España no tiene arreglo, ni en lo inmediato, y nosotros no podemos seguir sacrificando generaciones mientras debatimos sobre los matices todo un sistema corrupto se sigue lucrando a manos llenas y riéndose de nosotros.
Disculpe si le ofendí, aunque fue mi intención, me pareció demasiado aventurada su interpretación de porque los jóvenes son independentistas, me sonó un poco a eso de que los jóvenes no saben lo que hacen ni porque lo hacen...son otra generación diferente a la suya, no los subestime, una cosa saben cierta, en el futuro, en su futuro, no hay nada para ellos.

thread.title: Nasdaq Stockholm AB: Trender i bolagens finansiella rapportering (16\17)
thread.title_full: Nasdaq Stockholm AB: Trender i bolagens finansiella rapportering (16\17)

posts.title: Nasdaq Stockholm AB: Trender i bolagens finansiella rapportering (16\17)
posts.text: Nasdaq Stockholm AB: Trender i bolagens finansiella rapportering (16\17) Trender i bolagens finansiella rapporteringDe börsnoterade bolagens finansiella rapportering utvecklas kontinuerligt till följd av nya lagar, regelförändringar och nya tolkningar av befintliga bestämmelser. Nasdaq Stockholm AB ("Börsen") har sedan 2007 ansvarat för att övervaka den finansiella rapporteringen från emittenter på Nasdaq Stockholm så att denna upprättas i enlighet med relevanta finansiella rapporteringsramverk (i huvudsak IFRS). I övervakningsrollen ingår också att informera om de iakttagelser och resultat som övervakningen har generat. Med anledning av detta vill Börsen, liksom tidigare år, bjuda in till ett seminarium för att summera och presentera utvalda delar av undersökningen. Börsen vill med seminariet bidra till förbättringar i kommande finansiell rapportering inför 2018. När: Måndagen den 11 december 2017 kl. 9:00 - 12.00 (från kl. 8.30 serveras frukost) Vart: NASDAQ OMX Stockholm AB, Tullvaktsvägen 15, Stockholm - HörsalenProgram 8.30 - 9:00 Samling med kaffe och smörgås 9.00 - 9.10 Joakim Strid, Head of Surveillance Europe hälsar välkommen. 9.10 - 9.30 Tematisk genomgång 2016 (Nils Liliedahl) 9.30 - 10.15 Iakttagelser i delårsrapporter (Peter Malmqvist) 10.15 - 10.30 Kaffe 10.30 - 12.00 Iakttagelser i årsredovisningar (Jan Buisman) Seminariet är kostnadsfritt. Har du frågor gällande seminariet, vänligen kontakta Felix Andersson på 073 - 787 6939 (felix.andersson@nasdaq.com) Anmälan sker genom registrering på http://n.nasdaq.com/Trender_i_bolagens_finansiella_rapportering_111217 senast den 7 december 2016. Varmt välkomna! thread.title: Riksgälden: Surplus for Swedish central government in October
thread.title_full: Riksgälden: Surplus for Swedish central government in October

posts.author: Globenewswire
posts.title: Riksgälden: Surplus for Swedish central government in October
posts.text:
Swedish central government payments resulted in a surplus of SEK 6.7 billion in October. The Debt Office's forecast was a deficit of SEK 5.8 billion. The difference is explained by higher tax income. 
Tax income was approximately SEK 12 billion higher than calculated, mainly due to higher supplementary tax payments. 
The Debt Office's net lending to government agencies was in line with the October forecast. 
Interest payments on central government debt were SEK 0.5 billion lower than calculated. 
For the twelve-month period up to the end of October 2017, central government payments resulted in a surplus of SEK 73.2 billion. 
Central government debt amounted to SEK 1,296 billion at the end October. 
The outcome for November will be published on 7 December at 9.30 a.m. 
Contact 
Lina Majtorp, Analyst, +46 (0)8 613 46 76Robert Sennerdal, Press Secretary, +46 (0)8 613 47 01 Central government net borrowing requirement 1 (SEK million) Outcome Oct.

posts.author: nickenino
posts.text: ¿La corte? ¿Va a asistir la corte al concierto de esta noche? ¡Hostias!, ¿qué me pongo? ¿De bufón, dices? Vaya, no está en mi guardarropa. Bueno, no creo que asista la corte. Derecho a decidir, claro que sí, pero sin que una parte del pueblo pretenda hablar en nombre de la totalidad, sin trampas ni mentiras, sin forzar las cosas, sin jugar con los sentimientos, sin avasallar a otros pueblos vecinos que merecen, quizá, que se respete mínimamente el precario acuerdo constitucional alcanzado tras la dictadura, que se pacten con suficiente reflexión y serenidad los términos en que ese acuerdo debe ser modificado. O sea, sin despreciar las consecuencias que tienen las decisiones de un pueblo para los demás pueblos, sean o no considerados como hermanos, porque en todos los pueblos se aparece la virgen. Con un análisis serio del "enemigo" al que el independentismo se enfrenta (¿al que nos enfrentamos?) y no metiéndolo todo en el mismo saco, como si se tratase de un cuento para niños. No vale contentarse con invocar derechos generales o "valores universales" para imponer un criterio como si fuera la razón suprema del "bien" contra el "mal". El derecho a decidir, como en general los Derechos Humanos, suelen ser papel mojado, a menudo una excusa que se invoca para disimular intereses menos nobles, y no sirven de nada si detrás no hay verdades capaces de sustentarlos. Las verdades son siempre complejas. Los derechos son fruto de la lucha y nunca están definitivamente ganados.

thread.title: Facebook, arrivano i pagamenti digitali via Messenger
thread.title_full: Facebook, arrivano i pagamenti digitali via Messenger

posts.author: amminisrtrazione
posts.title: Facebook, arrivano i pagamenti digitali via Messenger
posts.text:
INFORMAZIONI Facebook, arrivano i pagamenti digitali via Messenger Per ora era una possibilità offerta solo negli Stati Uniti a utenti di PayPal che intendono pagare in moneta digitale. Presto questa operatività potrebbe essere estesa ad altri Paesi, a partire dal Regno Unito, e con altri sistemi di pagamento. Facebook sta infatti mettendo in condizione i propri utenti di inviarsi denaro tra loro via Messenger nelle prossime settimane, non appena il sistema sarà pronto. Gli utenti dovranno registrarsi con la propria carta di debito per inviare o ricevere denaro. Il numero uno di Messenger, David Marcus, ha sottolineato che negli Stati Uniti molte persone usano già la piattaforma di messaggistica per pagamenti di cifre inferiori ai 50 dollari. Un’opzione avviata già nel 2015, senza imporre un costo ai propri utenti. 
La mossa confermata da Facebook , dopo che per ore si sono succedute indiscrezioni sui siti specializzati, è parte di una tendenza crescente da parte dei giganti tecnologici per imprimere un’accelerazione nell’utilizzo del digitale per i pagamenti. Apple, che anche in Italia offre già ai propri utenti la possibilità di abbinare a un proprio dispositivo una carta di credito, lancerà a breve Apple Pay Cash, che utilizzerà il servizio iMessage. Altri player sono impegnati in questo settore, come Square (Square Cash), mentre Venmo con PayPal è una delle app più popolari non solo tra i giovani. 
La scelta del Regno Unito per il primo test extra Usa non è casuale : il mercato dei pagamenti digitali è meno saturo in Inghilterra, dove le applicazioni or ora citate non sono ancora operative, ma sistemi come Apple Pay e Android Pay sono già molto diffusi così come è molto diffusa la comunicazione mobile (sugli autobus non si può più pagare in contanti). 
«Ci sono enormi potenzialità di pagamento peer-to-peer»,dice Phil Sealy, capo analista di Abi Research. Messenger, è appena il caso di ricordarlo, viene già utilizzato per fornire servizi simili, attraverso gli strumenti di intelligenza artificiale: a febbraio TransferWise Ltd. (trasferimento internazionale di denaro) ha creato un “bot” per Messenger per l’invio di denaro tra utenti Condividi:

thread.title: AI 스피커 '카카오미니', 출시 9분만에 완판… "이달 중 재판매" 뉴스
thread.title_full: AI 스피커 '카카오미니', 출시 9분만에 완판… "이달 중 재판매" : 네이버 뉴스

posts.author: 머니S | 네이버 뉴스
posts.title: AI 스피커 '카카오미니', 출시 9분만에 완판… "이달 중 재판매" 뉴스
posts.text:
본문 이미지 영역 AI 스피커 카카오미니가 출시 9분 만에 완판됐다. /사진=홈페이지 캡처
카카오의 첫 AI 스피커인 카카오미니가 정식판매 시작 9분 만에 완판됐다. 카카오에 따르면 AI(인공지능) 스피커인 카카오미니는 7일 오전 판매 시작 9분 만에 수량 1만5000대가 모두 팔린 것으로 전해졌다.
카카오는 7일 "오전 11시부터 AI 스피커 카카오미니의 정식 판매를 시작한 결과 9분 만에 준비된 수량 1만5000대가 모두 완판됐다"고 밝혔다.
카카오미니는 카카오가 출시하는 AI 스피커로, 카카오의 통합 인공지능 플랫폼인 카카오아이가 적용된 기기다. 사용자들은 카카오 계정을 연동시켜 멜론 등 여러 서비스를 카카오미니를 통해 이용할 수 있다.
카카오는 출시를 기념해 이날 음원 서비스 멜론 정기결제 이용자 대상으로 정가(11만9000원)에서 58% 할인 된 4만9000원에 카카오미니를 구매할 수 있도록 했다. 멜론 정기결제 미이용자의 경우 카카오미니와 6개월 스트리밍 클럽 할인쿠폰 패키지를 8만9000원에 구매할 수 있다.
카카오 측은 "이달 중 동일한 가격 조건으로 재판매를 진행할 예정이다. 빠르게 판매를 재개할 수 있도록 노력할 것"이라고 밝혔다.
장영락 기자 ped19@mt.co.kr

thread.title: Where Have We Seen Them Before? • MetDaan – SmilyTube.com
thread.title_full: Where Have We Seen Them Before? • MetDaan – SmilyTube.com

posts.title: Where Have We Seen Them Before? • MetDaan – SmilyTube.com
posts.text:
Email 
Stranger Things season 2 was released on Netflix a little over a week ago, and, just like the first season, it has taken the internet by storm. Since you are reading this, I assume you’re already a fan. But if you are that one person who’s never seen an episode, here’s what it’s about. 
In the 1980s, a young boy disappears from the fictional town of Hawkins, Indiana. Supernatural things start happening in the town, and a girl with psychokinetic powers appears and helps the boy’s friends search for him. The originality of the story, the ’80s nostalgia it evokes, the wonderful characters and the brilliant soundtrack aren’t the only reasons that make this show the phenomenon that it is. 
It also has an amazing cast. Seeing ’80s stars Wynona Ryder and Matthew Modine together on screen is heartwarming. Ryder has been the star of many an iconic movie, the most well-known perhaps Heathers . And Modine was a real heartthrob in Married to the Mob , Full Metal Jacket , and Vision Quest . However, the core of the cast are the children. Despite their tender age, they are great actors, and have appeared in other roles as well. But where else have you seen them? Let’s take a look and find out! Winona Ryder Photo: Netflix/New World Pictures 
Winona Ryder plays Joyce Byers in Stranger Things . The 46-year-old actress was an icon in the ’80s and early ’90s, having appeared in movies such as Beetlejuice , Heathers, Mermaids , Edward Scissorhands , and Bram Stoker’s Dracula . She was nominated for an Academy Award for her role in The Age of Innocence in 1993. 
Ryder received a lot of attention from the media for her relationship with Johnny Depp in the ’90s, and then again when she was caught shoplifting in 2001. This incident was followed by a few years of absence from the screens, but Ryder returned with roles in high-profile films, like Star Trek and Black Swan . For her role in Stranger Things, she has been nominated for a Golden Globe and for a SAG award. Matthew Modine Photo: Netflix/TriStar Pictures 
58-year-old Matthew Modine stars as silver fox Dr. Martin Brenner in Stranger Things , but he was a real heartthrob back in the day. Remember Married to the Mob, Full Metal Jacket , and Vision Quest from the late ’80s? His portfolio also includes roles in Short Cuts , Any Given Sunday , The Dark Knight Rises , Weeds and Transporter 2 . And of course, who can forget one of the biggest flops in box office history, Cutthroats . But one of the roles he is most famous for is the title character of the 1984 classic Birdy . It’s a story about a Vietnam vet who starts believing he’s turning into a bird after the traumatic experiences he endures in the war. Millie Bobby Brown Photo: Netflix/BBC 
Millie Bobby Brown is only 13 years old, but she already has made an appearance in quite a few TV shows, such as Once Upon a Time in Wonderland, NCIS, Modern Family, and Grey’s Anatomy . For her portrayal of creepy, mysterious, and brilliant Eleven in Stranger Things she was nominated for a Primetime Emmy. If you like her Eleven, you might also like Brown in BBC’s Intruders . David Harbour Photo: Netflix/Columbia Pictures 
David Harbour has played a wide array of characters, thanks to his ability to portray authority figures, bad guys, or even both at the same time. The 42-year-old actor has appeared in movies like Black Mass, Quantum of Solace, Suicide Squad, and Brokeback Mountain, and in TV shows like Manhattan, The Newsroom, and Rake. He has participated in several Broadway shows, earning a Tony Award nomination for Who’s Afraid of Virginia Woolf? However, his most famous role came in 2014 in The Equalizer, where he played a corrupt cop opposit Denzel Washington’s vigilante. In Stranger Things he plays Chief Jim Hopper. Finn Wolfhard Photo: Netflix/CW 
The 14-year-old Canadian actor plays Mike Wheeler. Before Stranger Things, we’ve seen him on Supernatural in 2015. Before that, in 2014, he played a character with a facial disfigurement on The 100 . More recently he played Richie Tozier in It , which was released this September. Caleb McLaughlin Photo: Netflix/Disney on Broadway 
Similarly to the rest of the kids on the cast of Stranger Things , Caleb McLaughin has an impressive resume for his young years. The 16-year-old appeared in Law & Order:SVU, Unforgettable, Forever, and Shades of Blue . He began his career in the theater: McLaughlin played a Young Simba in the Broadway musical The Lion King . In Stranger Things he plays Lucas Sinclair. Gaten Matarazzo Photo: Netflix/Broadway 
15-year-old Gaten Materazzo began his acting career on Broadway, where he participated in Priscilla, Queen of the Desert as Benjamin, and in Les Misérables as Gavroche. He has also appeared on The Blacklist in 2015. Materazzo plays Dustin Henderson in Stranger Things. His voice changed so much from the time of the filming to the post-production, that he couldn’t record any additional dialogue because it would’ve seemed like his character was dubbed by another actor. Natalia Dyer Photo: Netflix/Gravitas Ventures 
Natalia Dyer plays Nancy Wheeler. Previously, you may have seen her in Hannah Montana : The Movie , where she played a character called Clarissa. In 2011, Dyer was in the movie The Greening of Whitney Brown , alongside Brooke Shields, and in 2014, she appeared in I Believe in Unicorns . The 20-year-old has also appeared in The Between, After Darkness, Blue Like Jazz, and Long Nights Short Mornings. Charlie Heaton Photo: Charlie Heaton – As You Are 
Charlie Heaton is an English actor who portrays Jonathan Byers. He made his on-screen debut on BBC’s DCI Banks in 2015. Since then, the 23-year-old has appeared in the British shows Vera and Casualty , and movies such as Urban & the Shed Crew, Rise of the Footsoldier Part II, Shut In, and As You Are. Joe Keery Photo: Netflix/Wolfe Releasing 
American actor Joe Keery is Steve Harrington on Stranger Things . The 25-year-old has got roles on three high-profile shows in 2015: Sirens, Chicago Fire, and Empire . In 2015, he participated in his first feature film, Henry Gamble’s Birthday Party. Noah Schnapp Photo: Netflix/20th Century Fox 
Noah Schnapp’s character Will Byers doesn’t have too many scenes on Stranger Things , but the 13-year-old actor makes sure every second counts. Previously, we have seen him in Bridge of Spies , and he has also done a bit of voice acting, lending his voice to characters in The Book of Pooh, The Peanuts Movie, and a video game from the Peanuts franchise. Cara Buono Photo: Netflix/AMC 
Stranger Things ‘ Karen Wheeler actress, Cara Buono, is experienced when it comes to being a parent to a child involved in supernatural activities, having previously appeared in 2010 film Let Me In . In television, she has been on many successful shows, such as Person of Interest , where she played Martine Rousseau, Third Watch (Grace Foster), Mad Men (Faye Miller), and The Sopranos, where she was Christopher’s wife, Kelli Moltisanti. In film, you may recognize the 43-year-old actress from Paper Towns, Hulk, Happy Accidents, Kicking and Screaming, and Beer League. Randell P. Havens Photo: Netflix/AMC 
Randall Havens plays Mr. Clarke. He has done some work in animation, giving voice to Mr. Rompers on Archer. Havens has appeared in the 2014 movie Let’s Be Cops , and has had quite a few roles in television, on shows like Halt and Catch Fire, Sleepy Hollow and The Vampire Diaries. Chris Sullivan Photo: Netflix/Cinemax 
Chris Sullivan’s character Benny Hammond from Stranger Things leaves quite an impression, despite his limited screen time. The first time he caught the public’s attention was when he played Tom Clearly in The Knick , where he got to use his original Irish accent. The 37-year-old has had appearances on The Normal Heart, The Americans, Law & Order: SVU, Elementary, and Peter Pan Live!, and has also played opposite Tom Hardy in The Drop and Daniel Radcliffe in Imperium . However, he is best known for his role as Taserface in Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2. Sullivan is currently working on NBC drama This Is Us. Ross Partridge Photo: Netflix/The Orchard 
Ross Partridge plays Lonnie Byers. The 49-year-old has appeared in over 40 roles, some of which were on As the World Turns, The Lost World: Jurassic Park, NYPD Blue, Quantum Leap, and Secret in Their Eyes . But, his most notable role is definitely that of David Lamb in 2015 in the drama film Lamb, which Partridge also directed and wrote the script for. Joe Chrest Photo: Netflix/MGM 
Joe Chrest is the actor who portrays Ted Wheeler. The American has appeared in more than 100 roles on screen, and 60 more on stage. Some of his most notable works include Ant-Man, True Detective, The Aviator, Battleship, Battle of Los Angeles, Drive Angry, Ocean’s 13, Medium, and The Ring. Chrest has also played Vernon Presley in Million Dollar Quartet , and David Schmidt in 21 and 22 Jump Street , alongside Jonah Hill. Tinsley and Anniston Price Photo: Netflix-AMC 
Identical twins Tinsley and Anniston Price started their acting careers in 2013, on The Walking Dead , where they played the character of Judith Grimes. In television and film, twins are often used to portray young children, because of the regulations which determine how many hours a day a child is allowed to work. The 5-year-old actresses have also appeared in 2016 movie Allegiant, in the upcoming Galveston, and of course, on Stranger Things , where they play Holly Wheeler. Rob Morgan – Luke Cage Photo: Netflix/Netflix 
Rob Morgan plays Officer Powell. He has had numerous roles on television over the years, some of which were on 30 Rock, Blue Bloods, and Law & Order: SVU . However, he is best known for his portrayal of Turk Barrett, the Hell’s Kitchen criminal who appears on Daredevil and Luke Cage.

thread.title: ‘Do not interfere with Anwar’s surgery’
thread.title_full: ‘Do not interfere with Anwar’s surgery’

posts.author: Berita Daily Staff
posts.title: ‘Do not interfere with Anwar’s surgery’
posts.text:
Twitter 
Nurul Nuha, demands that the government allow human rights organisations to monitor Anwar Ibrahim, during and after his surgery, as well as have unfettered medical access 
KUALA LUMPUR: The family of imprisoned PKR de facto leader Anwar Ibrahim told the government today not to interfere with his shoulder surgery scheduled Sunday. 
In a press conference at their family home in Segambut today, his daughter, Nurul Nuha, demanded that the government allow human rights organisations to monitor the former deputy prime minister during and after his surgery, as well as have unfettered medical access. 
“The nature of the surgery requires delicate and proper post-operation care and we have full faith and trust in the capable panel of doctors at Hospital Besar Kuala Lumpur (HKL) to conduct the operation with the utmost professionalism,” Nurul Nuha said in the press conference, the MalayMail Online reported. 
The family among others wanted; 
1. The government to guarantee that all required medical treatment is given to Anwar without any interference. 
2. Anwar is granted full rehabilitation facilities at the hospital due to the very limited access to proper post-operation care in Penjara Sungai Buloh. 
3. Allow access by human rights organisations to monitor his status throughout the surgery and post-surgery rehabilitation. 
Anwar will be admitted to HKL tomorrow for pre-surgery evaluation and will undergo the surgery on November 12. 
Nurul Nuha said the doctors expect his post-surgery recovery period to take around four months and the family will push for his post-surgery treatment to be conducted in the hospital and at the rehabilitation centre in Cheras. 
Nurul Nuha, who spoke to the press with two of her sisters, Nurul Hana and Nurul Iman, said that her father first injured his shoulder in a car accident many years ago. 
Apparently he has been managing the injury through physiotherapy and medication, but the condition became worse after his accident in September while he was on his way back to Sungai Buloh prison from HKL. 
His lawyer, Sivarasa Rasiah, said the accident involved the convoy of cars and vans carrying Anwar and prison officers at a traffic lights junction near Saujana Utama, around 12.30pm. 
The prison officers carrying Anwar had to brake sharply to avoid an oncoming vehicle, leading to one of the escort vehicles crashing into it. 
Nurul Nuha also said that her father’s imprisonment had caused the injury to deteriorate further as he lacked proper access to physiotherapy facilities in Sungai Buloh prison. 
“He is on medication every day, he is on Celebrex. He can’t lift his arm properly; even writing is painful for him. He can’t lift his arm higher than his shoulder. After his imprisonment and the accident, it became worse. He does have physiotherapy but it isn’t enough,” she said.

thread.title: Joanna Brodzik nie chciała popełniać błędów swoich rodziców. Po latach nawiązała kontakt z ojcem
thread.title_full: Joanna Brodzik nie chciała popełniać błędów swoich rodziców. Po latach nawiązała kontakt z ojcem

posts.title: Joanna Brodzik nie chciała popełniać błędów swoich rodziców. Po latach nawiązała kontakt z ojcem
posts.text:
Joanna Brodzik nie chciała popełniać błędów swoich rodziców. Po latach nawiązała kontakt z ojcem Rodzina jest najważniejsza Joanna Brodzik zawsze podkreśla, że rodzina jest dla niej najważniejsza; kiedy została matką, zrezygnowała na jakiś czas z kariery, chcąc każdą chwilę poświęcić swoim synom i partnerowi. Zależało jej na tym, by chłopcy mieli pełną rodzinę. ONS.pl Podziel się 
Sama, jako dziecko, nie miała tyle szczęścia. Jej rodzice rozstali się, gdy Brodzik była małą dziewczynką - od tamtej pory wychowywała się pod opieką mamy i babci, przez kilka lat nie miała z ojcem praktycznie żadnego kontaktu. 
Dopiero gdy dorosła, udało im się odbudować relację. Jak zapewnia aktorka, dziś mają ze sobą naprawdę dobry kontakt i świetnie się dogadują; również dlatego, że ojciec jest od niej starszy zaledwie o 18 lat. 
- Dziś mam w tacie przy tej niewielkiej różnicy wieku, jaka nas dzieli, wspaniałego przyjaciela – mówiła w "Wysokich Obcasach".

thread.title: La Russia ha finanziato Facebook e Twitter attraverso un socio di Jared Kushner
thread.title_full: La Russia ha finanziato Facebook e Twitter attraverso un socio di Jared Kushner

posts.author: amminisrtrazione
posts.title: La Russia ha finanziato Facebook e Twitter attraverso un socio di Jared Kushner
posts.text: La Russia ha finanziato Facebook e Twitter attraverso un socio di Jared Kushner Nei «Paradise Papers» ci sono anche investimenti nei social network riconducibili al Cremlino Mark Due società statali russe hanno sostenuto finanziariamente Facebook e Twitter tramite un socio in affari di Jared Kushner. L’informazione è contenuta nei «Paradise Papers», milioni di documenti ottenuti dal giornale tedesco Süddeutsche Zeitung e analizzati e pubblicati dal Consorzio internazionale di giornalismo investigativo. Lo riportano il New York Times e il Guardian . Il ponte fra il Cremlino e il colossi della Silicon Valley è Yuri Milner, magnate russo 55enne che detiene una partecipazione in una società del genero di Donald Trump e consigliere della Casa Bianca. I fatti risalgono al 2011, quando la banca statale russa Vtb ha finanziato un investimento da 191 milioni di dollari in Twitter e il ramo finanziario del colosso dell’energia Gazprom ha foraggiato una società offshore per effettuare un investimento di un miliardo di dollari in azioni di Facebook. In entrambi i casi, i soldi sono passati per la Dst Global del miliardario russo che in passato è arrivato a possedere più dell’8 per cento del social network di Mark Zuckerberg e un numero di quote superiore al 5 per cento di quello di Jack Dorsey. Le azioni sono poi state vendute prima delle quotazioni in Borsa di Facebook, 2012, e Twitter, 2013. Complessivamente Milner ha scommesso 7 miliardi in più di 30 società digitali, fra le quali Airbnb e Spotify. Milner e e Kushner sono legati dal possesso di azioni della startup immobiliare Cadre. Come rivelato dal Wall Street Journal lo scorso maggio, il genero di Trump è uno dei co-fondatori della realtà nata a New York nel 2014. Quando è entrato alla Casa Bianca non ha chiarito la natura della sua partecipazione. I due, stando a quanto dichiarato da Milner, si sono incontrati una sola volta. Non c’è alcuna prova di una possibile influenza esercitata dal Cremlino sui social network e sullo sviluppo degli stessi grazie al contributo di Milner o della Dst, ma le rivelazioni dei «Paradise Papers» — anticipate, in realtà, due giorni fa da Bloomberg — arrivano nel corso delle indagini sulle interferenze russe nella campagna (anche online) presidenziale del 2016. Condividi:
